title: Invite Friends & Traders and Earn!
description: Get a percentage of the trading and success fees paid by your friends or from all the investors of the trader's service when you invite a trader to Zignaly

step-1.title: Invite friends & Traders
step-1.description: Share your referral link above for friends to sign up to Zignaly with

step-2.title: They Deposit $100
step-2.description: Get your friends and traders to make a deposit of at least ${{minDeposit}}

step-3.title: You Both Earn
step-3.description: You both get ${{reward}} plus you'll earn commissions from traders

terms.title: Fixed Terms:
terms.fees: Fees are calculated over the fee that Zignaly receives, deducting a safety factor given that commissions are paid in advance
terms.1: Zignaly reserves the right to disqualify a participant if he/she engages in inappropriate, dishonest, or abusive activities.
terms.2: Zignaly reserves the right to amend the Terms and Conditions of the referral program at any time without prior notice.
terms.3: Participants who violate these terms will not be eligible for referral incentives; any fraudulent or abusive behaviors will immediately terminate all associated accounts.
terms.4: Paid online advertisements with the use of Zignaly's logo is strictly prohibited

table.title: Commissions history
table.no-commission-history: No commission history yet. Invite some friends or traders to earn commissions.
